author: Michael Atkinson
comment: Great app. However cannot get the photo background  to work. Which was the main reason for the upgrade. Any tips for this function?

author: Jake Engdahl
comment: What's up with this IAP trend with watch faces? I would have bought a handful by now if I could actually try the features first, smh. I won't pay a non-refundable IAP just to find out that one feature I wanted sucks. I won't steal and use cracked apps like a loser so I guess I'll just complain 😉

author: Keith S
comment: Really like it. Only issues I've had are setting a photo as the background doesn't seem to work for me and I always have to sync from my phone before premium settings are available on watch. I'm using Fossil Q Explorist.

author: Kip Dunn
comment: Samsung Galaxy Note 8 married to Sony Smartwatch 3. Try as I might I could not get this watchface to come up on my watch, despite all permissions being granted.

author: Mary McDonald
comment: I really like this watchface...it has all the data I want in a face...my only issue is the placement of the unread notification, in it's current location it covers the watch/phone battery...if there's a way to fix the placement it would be worth five stars

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Thanks - You can rotate the watch face so it does not cover the battery.

author: Aishiteru Suki
comment: Great looking watchface with lots of customization. it can fit lots of information, and yet maintaining a cool and clean design. The premium worth the price.

author: Scottietwotones
comment: Finally got it to take payment and glad it did this has become my main watch face its simple elegant & shows all the info I need.

author: Steane Blanch
comment: Plenty of things to customise and it's not too busy. Looks good.

author: John Chambers
comment: Free version is pretty simple for customizations, can't really do much until you pay for premium

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: We're a small company that strives to create stylish products to make sure you look your best. This does take time and effort though, and rather than using popup ads as a revenue stream as most free apps use, we chose to provide some limited free capabilities to show you what we can do, along with a wider range of options for a small fee.

author: Steven Elrod
comment: Is this for android wear devices only?

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Yes - this is only for Android Wear watches.

author: Aaron Whipkey
comment: Great watch face just wish the second bar was square not circular

author: Shayne
comment: This is a favorite face on my watch... Since downloading  (about 3 weeks ago)  all the others have been ignored and I have NO desire to use them anymore.

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Thanks so much! Glad to hear!

author: Shawn D
comment: Really? The face shown in the store is the premium version for $2.49. The free version isn't the one shown, and is missing everything but the time. Pretty deceptive way to get people to install.

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Please read the description and look at the pictures - it is very clear as to what is included in the basic version.

author: david ferry
comment: One of the best ever watch faces, great on battery life too

author: Eldar Mamaev
comment: Необычное и очень функционально симпатичное приложение. рекомендую!)

author: Ben McKinney
comment: One of my favorite watch faces colorful and has all I want on the face.

author: Aureliano Cilocilo
comment: Thanks guys apps looks amazing more power to all of you and hoping more apps are coming ...

author: Ashima Brown
comment: I love this App.

author: Jakša Suzić
comment: This free version lack more options. Everything more then a clock is premium. Too bad, look nice.

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: We're a small company that strives to create stylish products to make sure you look your best. This does take time and effort though, and rather than using popup ads as a revenue stream as most free apps use, we chose to provide some limited free capabilities to show you what we can do, along with a wider range of options for a small fee.

author: Luis Retana
comment: I really like it, however I'm unable to use pictures from gallery

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Please email me so I can help resolve this.

author: Dave Campbell
comment: AMAZING I am so impressed with this app, looks great, TONS of options, super handy widget for my phones home screen,LOW battery consumption. Hands down best watchface I have owned. Well worth the couple of bucks for the premium.  Great job to Dev!!!

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Thanks so much! Glad to hear you are enjoying it! 😊

author: Craig Armstrong
comment: Pretty pretty pretty pretty

Great looking watchface. But I had a lot of trouble getting the correct angle for my right wrist. Also I can't quite figure where the installed complications are. Other than that it's a great watchface

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Thanks -  Please review the Trouble Shooting or email me for help resolving.

comment: Well time.
